item.title: Missing Manhole cover, 18th August
item.description:
This drain has a missing cover - someone has put some MDF over it which has gone all soggy. I wouldnt want a pedestrian to fall in here as they will sue you for damages. It looks like a land drain. Although on the verge, I understand Verges are there to allow emergency services to pass etc, https://what3words.com/holds.gifts.hosts

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This has been reported many times by many people, it has been hastily repaired by pouring liquid tar over the holes., 18th August
item.description:
Https://what3words.com/chest.desks.jokes This is the biggest joke - but if a cyclist or motorcyclist were to hit this hole, they will come flying off. It has caused many damges to cars suspension etc. It needs digging out and refilling. Cars swerve to avoid this area, which means they cross onto the wrong side of the road, which is dangerous. SORT IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
